steps.name: Log in to the prolinker staging
Open sector selection for the 1 field
Open sector selection for the 2 field
Verify that the user is logged in

Enter description of yourself : Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. Verify that the user is logged
Verify that the alert about successful invite is displayed
Check the GMhpeTR's invitation card in the outgoing section
Verify that the name is GMhpeTR

Verify that the SMS text is Hi GMhpeTR, I'd like to add you to my network on Staging.prolinker.com!
